com.reply.solidsoft.nbs.integration.data.model

Interface DataTable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.io.Closeable, ResourceManager
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    NbsIntegrationLogDataTable, TypedDataTable<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    InMemoryDataTable, InMemoryLogDataTable, InMemoryRequests, InMemoryResponses

    public interface DataTable
extends ResourceManager
    The records store interface.
